title: The Siren's Son
description: He's an immortal warrior, but one lovely mortal will tempt him to defy his fate.Alec Cantio is the son of a siren. He and his three brothers hide their true identities while protecting humans from the negligence of the gods. All Alec wants when he visits his favorite magic shop, Speak O’ the Devil, are provisions for his task. But he finds instead a mortal woman, innocent and brave, who tempts him to all he can never have.Eilidh MacLeod just wants to close her grandad's shop, and mourn him in peace. But when she's thrust into a world filled with magic, mythical creatures, and gods, she must find a way to control her powers, or be destroyed by a vengeful Circe. At the same time, she must deal with her powerful attraction to the magnetic Alec. Can Alec and his brothers protect Eilidh until she comes into her power? And can she harness her magic to save them, and all mortals?
author: Helen  Scott
